about_the_game:
Get Your Tux Back!


BlokhedJelli is a 2D platforming collect-a-thon that takes you on an adventure to different worlds; each with its own theme and strange inhabitants.

Froggy has stolen a fancy tuxedo to make himself more charismatic and is using his new image to trick others into spreading the seeds of a mysterious flower he found. Unfortunately for him, the tux he stole belongs to Blokhed.

Play as Blokhed, the straight-laced organizer, and Jelli, the messy prankster. While exploring different worlds infested with mysterious flowers, they must move past their differences, get Blokhed's tuxedo back, and save their infested worlds.

Features


  • Find and Collect jellis, hunny buns, and more!
  • Rival Bosses that evolve based on how you treat your foes!
  • Explore 9 Different Worlds and Over 40 Levels!
  • Exciting 2D Action Platforming!
  • Save or Defeat Your Enemies to stop Froggy and get your tux back!

name: BlokhedJelli

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 3.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL Support required
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
